      • calculateFirstEntryHash

        public byte[] calculateFirstEntryHash(java.util.List<java.lang.String> externalIds,
                                      java.lang.String content)
        Calculates the entryHash of the first entry in a chain. This is only applicable to the first entry, hence you do not have to provide the chain Id.
        Parameters:
        externalIds - The external Ids
        content - The content
        Returns:
        The entryHash
